title: Urgot VU leaked
body: This image was leaked yesterday on Reddit, so I guess the Urgot update should hit PBE in no time! Is anyone else as freaked out as I am? {{champion:35}}

replies.body: Please tell me I'm not the only one who noticed Poppy's face inside the arm cannon.

> [{quoted}](name=iLuma,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ItYsnTi8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-27T13:44:18.743+0000)
>
> Please tell me I'm not the only one who noticed Poppy's face inside the arm cannon.

Oh jesus, the splash just got a hundred times more creepy.
I didn't till you mentioned it... so... thanks for that .__.
Hi, it's me Counterclockwork the original creator. See below as I've made some artistic enhancements to this based on your feedback. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Wait, is there Teemo in that? Plox no more. But seriously, don't you think you were a little bit too harsh when you put that face on Urgot? I mean, he may be dead, but he still has feelings... I guess? {{champion:14}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:83}} **emotional zombies 2015*
I would engage in hard copulation and climb the elo ladder at the same time with this champ.
I didn't think he could get uglier and more terrifying. D:
